The main event in this passage is the individual's feelings of loneliness, sadness, and self-hatred. They mention struggling with their identity, feeling unfulfilled, and missing their girlfriend who they pushed away. The individual also expresses a desire for another chance to start over, but feels stuck in their current life without an escape. Additionally, they apologize to those they have hurt.
Post: "Feeling suffocated by my own loneliness and self-doubt, I can't help but wonder if I'll ever find my way back to the person I used to be. The weight of my past mistakes continues to bear down on me, making it hard to see a future without the constant reminder of what I've lost. Despite my best efforts, I still feel unfulfilled and disconnected from the world around me. My apologies to those I've hurt along the way, but sometimes it feels like the only way to escape this dark cloud is to push people away before they can see the ugliness within me. Maybe someday, I'll get another chance to start over and find some semblance of peace." #internalattributionalstyle #ias #selfdoubt #loneliness #regret
